messages.message:
The traffic didn't route to the Nginx pod. :thinking_face:


`docker run --name instabase-server-nginx \`
`--env-file localsettings.env \`
`-p 80:8081 --rm -i instabase/server-nginx`
@Jet restart all your services, especially nginx, and resync your sandbox. The correct command has `-p 8080:8080` now.
i restarted, and resync too, let me do that again

Double-check your port mappings match after the services start:

```cs/mfichman❯ docker ps --format='table {{.Image}}\t{{.Ports}}'
IMAGE                             PORTS
instabase/grpc-file-service       0.0.0.0:9600->9600/tcp, [::]:9600->9600/tcp
instabase/license-service         0.0.0.0:9006->9006/tcp, [::]:9006->9006/tcp
instabase/control-plane           0.0.0.0:9500->9500/tcp, [::]:9500->9500/tcp
instabase/ocr-service             0.0.0.0:7068->7068/tcp, [::]:7068->7068/tcp, 0.0.0.0:7090->7090/tcp, [::]:7090->7090/tcp
instabase/weaviate                0.0.0.0:5082->5082/tcp, [::]:5082->5082/tcp
instabase/core-platform-service   0.0.0.0:8600-8610->8600-8610/tcp, [::]:8600-8610->8600-8610/tcp
instabase/job-service             0.0.0.0:9800->9800/tcp, [::]:9800->9800/tcp
instabase/search-tservice         0.0.0.0:7600->7600/tcp, [::]:7600->7600/tcp
instabase/celery-app-tasks        
instabase/api-server              0.0.0.0:5555->5555/tcp, [::]:5555->5555/tcp
instabase/webapp                  0.0.0.0:5000->5000/tcp, [::]:5000->5000/tcp
instabase/server-nginx            0.0.0.0:8080->8080/tcp, [::]:8080->8080/tcp
instabase/model-service           0.0.0.0:7800->7800/tcp, [::]:7800->7800/tcp
instabase/table-tservice          0.0.0.0:9091->9091/tcp, [::]:9091->9091/tcp
instabase/webpack                 0.0.0.0:8081->8081/tcp, [::]:8081->8081/tcp
instabase/conversion-service      0.0.0.0:7979->7979/tcp, [::]:7979->7979/tcp
instabase/weaviate-titan          8080/tcp, 0.0.0.0:5083->8888/tcp, [::]:5083->8888/tcp```
In particular, nginx should be 8080->8080 now
